arts.ttl: Steven Naismith declares Celtic 'couldn't be bothered' with Rangers clash as Brendan Rodgers lands brutal truth bomb
arts.sum: Philippe Clement grabbed his first derby win over Brendan Rodgers with a 3-0 triumph at Ibrox.

arts.ttl: Motherwell's Miller to miss up to two months with ankle fracture
arts.sum: Influential teenage Motherwell midfielder Lennon Miller will be sidelined for up to two months after fracturing his ankle.

arts.ttl: Hearts claim much-needed win as early Musa Drammeh goal downs Motherwell
arts.sum: Drammeh struck in the seventh minute to earn the second-bottom Jambos victory.

arts.ttl: Ryan Stevenson in sizzling 7-pronged Hearts takedown as he gets stuck in about the club he loves
arts.sum: Hearts were a incredibly successful club the last couple of years but the reality is now they are a massively depreciating commodity
